briefdescription.para: you must call this manually prior to program exit to avoid memory leaks
read from stdin, returns the string
get current console's Code Page. for a list of code pages check link: https://docs.microsoft.com/el-gr/windows/desktop/Intl/code-page-identifiers

detaileddescription.para: by default set to output mode the mode is changed dynamically depending on print/log/read operation request
